thread.title: BidPal Launches #GivingTuesday Online Resource Center for Nonprofits
thread.title_full: BidPal Launches #GivingTuesday Online Resource Center for Nonprofits

author: admin
title: BidPal Launches #GivingTuesday Online Resource Center for Nonprofits
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 3:47 PM   BidPal 
INDIANAPOLIS, Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- BidPal , the leader in mobile bidding and fundraising technology for nonprofits, has launched a #GivingTuesday resource center at BidPal.com/GivingTuesday , 12 weeks ahead of the biggest giving day of the year. The resource center provides nonprofits useful information on how to plan, promote, administer, and aggregate their #GivingTuesday campaigns with other end-of-year fundraising campaigns. 
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150908/264534LOGO 
"Over the last four years #GivingTuesday has grown into one of the biggest giving days of the year," said BidPal CEO Steve Johns. "We know it's an extremely busy time for our nonprofit clients, planning and wrapping up their end-of-year fundraising. We hope that by launching our #GivingTuesday resource center 12 weeks out, we can help plan and show our nonprofit clients how to easily leverage #GivingTuesday to raise even more money for their causes." 
BidPal's #GivingTuesday resource center will be updated every Tuesday with new content. First up: a four-part series on how to plan a simple and effective campaign. Currently on the site, nonprofits also will find: -- Registration links for an upcoming BidPal webinar "Cultivating Your Donors for Giving Tuesday" featuring guest speakers from Human Rights Watch and the National Kidney Foundation Wisconsin -- Recordings of past BidPal webinars: "Ready, Set, Promote! #GivingTuesday" and "Tips & Tools to Maximize #GivingTuesday" -- BidPal articles and informative third party articles -- Links to #GivingTuesday toolkits, case studies, and logos 
About #GivingTuesday 
#GivingTuesday is a global day dedicated to giving back. On Tuesday, December 1, 2015, coinciding with the Thanksgiving holiday and the kickoff of the holiday shopping season, people and organizations around the world will come together to celebrate generosity and to give. Founded in 2012 by New York's 92nd Street Y in partnership with the United Nations Foundation, #GivingTuesday has become a global movement that has engaged more than 30,000 organizations worldwide. 
About BidPal, Inc. 
BidPal creates technology for good that helps nonprofits engage their constituents and raise more money. The company's efficient, dynamic fundraising technology includes: fundraising software; event management solutions; mobile bidding; Text2Give(TM); payment processing; ticketing; online fundraising; and much more. To learn more, visit www.BidPal.com or call 1-888-729-0399. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/bidpal-launches-givingtuesday-online-resource-center-for-nonprofits-300139346.html 
SOURCE BidPal
